backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing build-related features, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing layout, pages, components, media utilities, and content modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/_redirects: Redirect rule sending all paths to index.html for SPA routing.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects all unknown routes to index.html while preserving URL parts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps pages inside SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/branding/Portfol: Component showing live site and gallery URLs with copy-to-clipboard actions.
frontend/src/components/branding/QRCodeB: Renders a QR code SVG from a matrix inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/branding/Section: Simple reusable title/subtitle section header component.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with logo, quick links, contact info, social links, and Caffeine attribution using publicAsset.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header component with logo, navigation links, social icons, and a mobile menu sheet.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper that renders the header, footer, and page content.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaLight: Displays an image or video in a modal lightbox with title and close control.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaStrip: Renders a grid preview of up to four gallery items with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Service section card showing description, features, and related media.
frontend/src/content/branding.ts: Centralized brand asset definitions including logo and company name.
frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts: Exports gallery item definitions for images and videos across categories.
frontend/src/content/qrMatrix.ts: Static 2D matrix representing a QR code pattern.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines service metadata including descriptions, features, and additional offerings.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Provides core site copy including company info, vision, mission, and contact details.
frontend/src/content/socialLinks.ts: Stores URLs for the brand's social media profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for backend-related React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables, dark mode settings, and utility classes including gold accents.
frontend/src/lib/publicAsset.ts: Generates correct public asset URLs using Viteâ€™s BASE_URL handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company description, services list, and styled content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact methods including email, location, and phone numbers using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a tabbed media gallery with category filtering, lightbox support, and public asset loading.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage with hero section, navigation buttons, contact summary, QR block, and services preview.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page by listing all service sections and an additional offerings grid within styled card components.
frontend/src/pages/VisionMissionPage.tsx: Displays the Vision and Mission content using two styled cards with icons and siteCopy text.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the Shams Al Qamar portfolio site.
